an3.46:1.1: “Yam, bhikkhave, silavanto pabbajita gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharanti.
an3.46:1.2: Tattha manussa tihi thanehi bahum punnam pasavanti.
an3.46:1.5: Yam, bhikkhave, silavanto pabbajita gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharanti.
an3.46:1.6: Tattha manussa imehi tihi thanehi bahum punnam pasavanti”ti.
